tool_description: Will return text chunks based on an ID
name: RA3Scarsi
title: RA3Scarsi

api_list.name: Text Chunk
api_list.description: Returns a text chunk for a specific id

api_list.name: Main
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ra3scarsi.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ra3scarsi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://ra3scarsi.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
